attributes.description:
The noted price is for a cash purchase however we do offer finance through all banks including IEMAS and Investec. The finance price will be an additional R20 000. This vehicle has accident history however repaired as seen on images. Cash Price Noted Above, Dekra inspection (condition and diagnosis report) of R1756 will be done at your own cost.

Please note that our cash deals do not include VAT. We charge an additional admin fee of R3500 for license and registration, fuel and temp permit (if required).

Our operating hours are from 8:00am-17:00pm weekdays and Saturday from 08:00am-15:00pm.

We accept cash, and fully paid up trade-ins. 

Book your viewing and test drive today with our sales team.

attributes.description:
Automatic Yaris 1.5 XS 

Driving pleasure, always a winner with low milage, full service history and well maintained. Has Wi-fi, Spare Keys and Dekra RWC. This Toyota Yaris is a great buy and available at Autotops situated in George 23 York street our friendly sales team will assist you in all enquiries we offer in house finance and deliver nationwide . Trade-ins are welcome.

At Autotops we thrive through the earned loyalty of our clients, friends, and family. We function as a team, work ethically, and remain focused on exceeding expectations of our customers. Our customers buy dreams, and we strive to make them great.
